about.details:
Incorporated in 2009, Amanaya Ventures Limited was formed with the objective of promoting SPOT buying and selling of Gold across India. They are bullion traders, specializing in bars and coins of various sizes and weights of Gold and Silver.

The company offers wholesale delivery of bullion to domestic users like ornament manufacturers, goldsmiths, jewelers, and semi-wholesalers as well as individual customs. The Company is a member of "The Indian Bullion and Jewellers Association Ltd" and "The Federation of Indian Export Organisations".

The company also offers the Aurel Gold Purchase Plan for retail customers in order to enable them to purchase physical gold in smaller quantities. The motive of the company is to provide a transparent, convenient, and cost-effective manner for purchasing gold.

Amanaya Ventures Limited has developed its own brand under the name "Aurel Bullion". The brand provides advantage to the customers for relying on the quality of
the product. All of the gold jewellery offered is hallmarked by BIS except gold jewellery weighing less than two grams which is not required to be hallmarked.

faqs.question: What is the Amanaya Ventures IPO?
faqs.answer:
Amanaya Ventures IPO is a SME IPO of 1200000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2.76 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹23 per share. The minimum order quantity is 6000.

The IPO opens on February 24, 2023, and closes on February 28, 2023.

Beetal Financial & Computer Services (P) Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Amanaya Ventures IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Amanaya Ventures IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Amanaya Ventures IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Amanaya Ventures IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Amanaya Ventures IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Amanaya Ventures IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Amanaya Ventures IPO opens on February 24, 2023 and closes on February 28, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Amanaya Ventures IPO?
faqs.answer: Amanaya Ventures IPO lot size is 6000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,38,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Amanaya Ventures IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Amanaya Ventures IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Amanaya Ventures IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Amanaya Ventures IPO will be done on Friday, March 3, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, March 8, 2023. Check the Amanaya Ventures IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Amanaya Ventures IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Amanaya Ventures IPO listing date is on Thursday, March 9, 2023.
